title: Verify all POI pins are displayed correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN POIs of each type are added to the map

This can be added via club tools: https://clubtoolsqa.mlbinfra.com -> Maps Editor -> Create New POI

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN each POI should have the correct pin displayed
THEN the correct image icon should be displayed in the footer next to the POI name

title: Subheader in Footer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there are POIs on the map that have a subheader field filled out

This can be added via club tools: https://clubtoolsqa.mlbinfra.com -> Maps Editor -> Create New POI

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the POI with a subheader is selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a footer will appear with sub text below the name of the POI and the location text will appear below that

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a POI is selected without a subheader field
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the sub text does not appear and the location text is shown right below the POI name

title: POI Search
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a map which has POIs
custom_steps: WHEN user searches for a POI
custom_expected: THEN POIs which match the search criteria are displayed

title: POI By Category
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is viewing a map with a current level selected
custom_steps: WHEN User filters POIs by category where at least one POI meets criteria
custom_expected: THEN only POIs which match filter are displayed

title: POI with Menu Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN user can select each menu from POI

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user logged in with MLB account in the Ballpark app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is successfully Sign In

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user click on the Team Tab and select the Team which has Maps/Directory
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Maps displays with Levels dropdown, POIs

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user click on the each menus of POI
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN POI name displays with Location under level dropdown with "x" sign on the right
